block_or_article_check.name: block_or_article_check
block_or_article_check.value: ("block_content"."block_id" IS NOT NULL AND "block_content"."article_id" IS NULL) OR ("block_content"."block_id" IS NULL AND "block_content"."article_id" IS NOT NULL)

article_or_block_check.name: article_or_block_check
article_or_block_check.value: ("quote_positions"."article_id" IS NOT NULL AND "quote_positions"."block_id" IS NULL) OR ("quote_positions"."article_id" IS NULL AND "quote_positions"."block_id" IS NOT NULL)
